name: Emberlight (itch) (OOKAMI)
description:
The game is currently in development. Demo contains the story, tutorial and the first stage.

Hero:

Darkness has taken over the Kingdom of Zirelle after the fire demon Rrath attacked. Help princess Zirelle in her journey to defeat Rrath and bring back light to the kingdom.

Stages:

Multiple Stages with different environments (Stage1 available in demo. Other stages currently being worked on). The princess must guide her way through the unknow lands, enemies and traps to make it to the end of each stage.

Traps and enemies:

There are multiple traps laid out across the stages. 20 Enemy Types to face. Each enemy is randomly generated on each of the stages to provide a unique experience every time. Will you make it to the other side?

Online Scoreboard:

The game has an online scoreboard. Compete with your friends in completing the levels. Aim for quickest completion times or the highest scores.
